message: I have a unique opportunity for you, Bob. I'm willing to sell you this amazing product for $14000. It's a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a deal like this elsewhere.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can only justify a purchase price of $12000. I hope we can come to an agreement.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. I can offer the product to you for $13000. It's a fair price, considering the value it brings to you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. While $13000 is still slightly out of my budget, I would be willing to consider $12500 as a compromise. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you.

I'm glad we're getting closer, Bob. However, I still need to make a profit on this sale. I can offer the product to you for $13200. It's a bit higher than your last offer, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle again. Let me know if this is something you'd be willing to consider.

I appreciate your efforts to accommodate my budget, Alice. I am willing to meet you halfway between our last offers. My counteroffer is $12800 for the product. I hope this proposal is agreeable to you.
